items.content_html: The MQTT-Influx-Bridge project collects sensor data from MQTT devices and stores it in an InfluxDB database for Grafana-based visualization. It offers a lightweight, customizable alternative to NodeRED.

items.content_html: Task-Tracker is a simple yet powerful todo application built using React.js, designed to help users manage their tasks efficiently. This lightweight web app stores tasks in the browser's localStorage, making it convenient and accessible across sessions.
